评论详情: The earrings are very nice. And the price was unbelievable low. I’m very pleased with my beautiful earrings. So buy buy buy. I do recommend. Sherry
The are a little large but once you wear them with something black they are really cool and I don’t feel like they are too big at all.

These earrings are lightweight and true to color. They are made out of wood and painted. they could have done a better job with the pain, it looks like a very thin paint, watercolor like, no acrylic. Also they need a better quality control because the ones I got had some small leftover pieces of wood where it supposed to be cut. I got a thin object in the openings and sort of broke them off but you can still notice there isn't a nice finish. I think for the price that's manageable. They are pretty.
